data.trans_hint: Chúng tôi có rất nhiều điểm chung. Ví dụ, chúng tôi đều thích thú với việc đi du lịch, đồ ăn và thiền.
data.en_hint: We have many things in common. For example, both of us are enthusiastic about traveling, food, and meditation.
data.content_game_1: We have many things in common. For example, both of us are enthusiastic about traveling, food, and meditation.
data.answer_en_hint: We have many things in common. For example, both of us are enthusiastic about traveling, food, and meditation.

data.trans: Gia đình hạt nhân (gồm bố mẹ và con)
data.trans_hint: Mọi người ngày nay có xu hướng sống trong gia đình hạt nhân thay vì gia đình mở rộng khi khoảng cách thế hệ đang ngày càng lớn hơn.
data.en_hint: People nowadays have a tendency to live in a nuclear family instead of an extended one as the generation gap is getting bigger and bigger.
data.content_game_1: People nowadays have a tendency to live in a nuclear family instead of an extended one as the generation gap is getting bigger and bigger.
data.answer_en_hint: People nowadays have a tendency to live in a nuclear family instead of an extended one as the generation gap is getting bigger and bigger.

data.trans_hint: Cách một đứa trẻ được nuôi dưỡng có ảnh hưởng mạnh mẽ đến đức tin cũng như thế giới quan của trẻ trong cuộc sống sau này.
data.en_hint: The way a child is brought up has a very strong influence on his belief system as well as his outlook on the world later in life.
data.content_game_1: The way a child is brought up has a very strong influence on his belief system as well as his outlook on the world later in life.
data.answer_en_hint: The way a child is brought up has a very strong influence on his belief system as well as his outlook on the world later in life.

data.trans_hint: Trong gia đình, tôi luôn được nhìn nhận như là một đứa mọt sách, lúc nào cũng thấy cắm mặt vào đọc sách thôi.
data.en_hint: In my family, I always come across as a nerd who always has my head buried in a book.
data.content_game_1: In my family, I always come across as a nerd who always has my head buried in a book.
data.answer_en_hint: In my family, I always come across as a nerd who always has my head buried in a book.

data.trans: Thoải mái, không lo nghĩ (tính cách)
data.trans_hint: Không giống mẹ tôi, mẹ lúc nào cũng nghiêm túc với mọi thứ, tôi khá là thoải mái.
data.en_hint: Unlike my mother, who takes things very seriously, I am quite laid-back.
data.content_game_1: Unlike my mother, who takes things very seriously, I am quite laid-back.
data.answer_en_hint: Unlike my mother, who takes things very seriously, I am quite laid-back.

data.trans_hint: Do sự thuận tiện của giao thông, con người ngày này có xu hướng đi xa để lập nghiệp, điều đó khiến các gia đình ngày càng phân tán và ít thân thiết.
data.en_hint: Due to the convenience of transportation, many people have a tendency to establish their careers far away from home, which makes families widely dispersed and less close.
data.content_game_1: Due to the convenience of transportation, many people have a tendency to establish their careers far away from home, which makes families widely dispersed and less close.
data.answer_en_hint: Due to the convenience of transportation, many people have a tendency to establish their careers far away from home, which makes families widely dispersed and less close.

data.trans_hint: Gia đình cho con người ta một nhận thức về danh tính, là cách mà chúng ta định nghĩa bản thân mình.
data.en_hint: Families give people a sense of identity, which refers to the way you define yourself .
data.content_game_1: Families give people a sense of identity, which refers to the way you define yourself .
data.answer_en_hint: Families give people a sense of identity, which refers to the way you define yourself .

data.trans_hint: Hãy ở bên người mà bạn có thể là chính mình, nghĩa là bạn không phải giả vờ là một người khác khi ở cạnh họ.
data.en_hint: Be with someone that you can be yourself with, which means you don't have to pretend to be someone else when you are around them.
data.content_game_1: Be with someone that you can be yourself with, which means you don't have to pretend to be someone else when you are around them.
data.answer_en_hint: Be with someone that you can be yourself with, which means you don't have to pretend to be someone else when you are around them.

data.trans: Tranh cãi, tranh giành điều gì
data.trans_hint: Em gái và tôi có quan hệ rất tốt. Chúng tôi không bao giờ tranh giành bất cứ điều gì.
data.en_hint: My sister and I are on very good terms. We never argue over anything.
data.content_game_1: My sister and I are on very good terms. We never argue over anything.
data.answer_en_hint: My sister and I are on very good terms. We never argue over anything.

data.content: the black sheep of the family
data.trans: Kẻ lạc loài trong gia đình
data.trans_hint: Vì tôi không theo nghiệp gia đình là trở thành một bác sĩ thay vì một vũ công, nên mọi người đều nghĩ rằng tôi là kẻ lạc loài trong gia đình.
data.en_hint: Since I didn't follow in the family footsteps, which is becoming a doctor instead of a breakdancer, everyone thinks that I am the black sheep of the family.
data.content_game_1: Since I didn't follow in the family footsteps, which is becoming a doctor instead of a breakdancer, everyone thinks that I am the black sheep of the family.
data.answer_en_hint: Since I didn't follow in the family footsteps, which is becoming a doctor instead of a breakdancer, everyone thinks that I am the black sheep of the family.
